# userInterfaceDirectionPolicy

**Instance Property**

The directionality of user interface elements.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var userInterfaceDirectionPolicy: WKUserInterfaceDirectionPolicy { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default value is [doc://com.apple.webkit/documentation/WebKit/WKUserInterfaceDirectionPolicy/content]. For other possible values, see [doc://com.apple.webkit/documentation/WebKit/WKUserInterfaceDirectionPolicy].

## Selecting user interface directionality

- **WKUserInterfaceDirectionPolicy**: The policy that determines the directionality of user interface elements in a web view.
